title: Chief Strategy Officer
description: Chris is a sophomore studying Technology, Information, and Society. He is originally from Cape Cod, MA, and has spent the last eight years in the US Army as a combat medic with deployments to Afghanistan and Africa in the 101st Airborne and Civil Affairs units. Chris participates in the Harvard Undergraduate Veterans Organization and Harvard Leadership Institute. When he graduates, Chris hopes to run a nonprofit for veterans. In his free time Chris enjoys rock climbing, mountaineering, and skiing.
